resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

worklogs.comment:
kszucs opened a new pull request #11776:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11776


   More recent vcpkg [is not compatible with older glibc shipped by manylinux2010](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11569#issuecomment-978031842) so we won't be able to regularly update the dependencies. Besides that manylinux2010 [has reached EOL](https://github.com/pypa/manylinux#manylinux2010-centos-6-based---eol).
   


--

amol- commented on pull request #11776:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11776#issuecomment-979178591


   > Are we sure we want to stop supporting systems before CentOS 7? Perhaps this deserves a ML discussion.
   
   CentOS 6 reaches end of life at the end of the month, so I guess people will upgrade. We probably want to ensure support for version <7 for a few months to give time for people to upgrade, but I guess it might be a safe bet that once Arrow 7.0.0 will be out most people will have upgraded.
   


--

kszucs commented on pull request #11776:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11776#issuecomment-979303344


   I managed to [patch[elf] the vcpkg binary with glibc 2.18](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11569/files#diff-6f627de1c3985ba6a76addecbcb7b3cb88ca0ca6244d91339a348cf4d48db914R52-R53) in the manylinux2010 image, so we should be able to maintain the builds until the vcpkg dependencies compile.


--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: More recent vcpkg is not compatible with older glibc shipped by manylinux2010 so we won't be able to regularly update the dependencies. Besides that manylinux2010 has reached EOL.

comments.body:
> Besides that manylinux2010 has reached EOL.

Source?

Closing as "won't fix" for now.

Quoting [~kszucs]:
{quote}I managed to [patch[elf] the vcpkg binary with glibc 2.18|https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11569/files#diff-6f627de1c3985ba6a76addecbcb7b3cb88ca0ca6244d91339a348cf4d48db914R52-R53] in the manylinux2010 image, so we should be able to maintain the builds until the vcpkg dependencies compile.
 
Closing in favor of [{{2233ac5}}|https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/2233ac5782e52015d1f51ac3f7dd201c1262a947]
{quote}
